snippet: After two deployments in Afghanistan, Lt. Col. Daniel L. Davis says the Pentagon is not telling the whole truth about how the war there is going.
abstract: Lt Col Daniel L Davis, who served two deployments in Afghanistan, is conducting a one-man truth-telling campaign, contending that senior military officials have concealed vital information about the state of the Afghanistan war; Davis has published a long article detailing his accusations in The Armed Forces Journal.
lead_paragraph: After two deployments in Afghanistan, Lt. Col. Daniel L. Davis says the Pentagon is not telling the whole truth about how the war there is going.
